item.title: Reversing Hero
item.author: Author
item.description: INTRODUCTION ReversingHero is a Reverse Engineering self learning kit (x86_64 on linux) wrapped inside one binary file. It is made of 15 levels, with difficulty gradually increasing. Created by xoprd, this course can be found here : Reversing Hero Here is just my attempt to solve the 15 levels. ▸ Reversing Hero 1 ▸ Reversing Hero 2 The following procedure shows a simple routine where there is a bit rotation.
